name: Introduction to German I
description: This is the language course to take if you have had no previous experience of the German language. The emphasis is on comprehension, speaking, reading, writing, vocabulary and basic grammar. This course can be counted towards all programs in German. Note: Students with any previous knowledge of German are REQUIRED to take a placement test offered at the department.
exclusions: Senior high school German or equivalent. Note: Students with any previous knowledge of German are required to take a placement test offered at the department.
